titleStmt.title: The triall of vvitch-craft shewing the true and right methode of the discouery: with a confutation of erroneous wayes. By Iohn Cotta, Doctor in Physicke.
titleStmt.author: Cotta, John, 1575?-1650?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Samuel Rand, and are to be solde at his shop neere Holburne-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The tryall of witch-craft, with the true discouerie thereof.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
